com.mysema.query.mongodb

Class MongodbQuery<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysema.query.mongodb.MongodbQuery<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilteredClause<MongodbQuery<K>>, SimpleProjectable<K>, SimpleQuery<MongodbQuery<K>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MorphiaQuery

    public abstract class MongodbQuery<K>
extends Object
implements SimpleQuery<MongodbQuery<K>>, SimpleProjectable<K>
    MongodbQuery provides a general Querydsl query implementation with a pluggable DBObject to Bean transformation
    Author:
    laimw
